original_text: He will direct the shock of his battering rams against your walls, and with his axes he will break down your towers.
korean_text: 공성퇴를 가지고 네 성을 치며 도끼로 망대를 찍을 것이며

sentences.original_text: He will direct the shock of his battering rams against your walls
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 공성추의 충격을 네 성벽에 겨눌 것이다

sentences.original_text: and with his axes he will break down your towers
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 도끼들로 네 망대를 부술 것이다
